channel.title: Long Page Loading Times
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Long Page Loading Times" - Is anyone having this problem?

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: I'm not sure about the problem, I'm using Opera and I have never seen signs for abnormal lag.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: Truthfully, doing all your browsing under Firefox is probably safer. IE is pretty dangerous at this point.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: Problem solved! Thanks everyone. I guess I'll just have to play BvS with Firefox from now on.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: Okay, I installed Firefox and downloaded AdBlock+, but how the heck do I install AdBlock+?

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded:
You're all right, it does seem to be the adds timing out. Each other page it seems my browser also blocks an attempt by the website to run a Google IE Client Toolbar Add-on.

I normally use IE as my browser and I never had problems with BvS until 2 days ago. I'll try switching to Firefox and try out that add-on.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded:
I originally had similar problems with the BvS pages, but I had installed AdBlock+ in Firefox as an addon, and the load times became effectively instantaneous. It's probably a problem with the ads on both sites.

AdBlock+ is available here.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded:
I had delays in my firefox but I installed plugin NoScript and allowed only Anime Cubed page for BvS.

Now I have instantaneous page load.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: The last time something like this happened, it was because one of the advertisers was being really slow. If you're using Firefox or Seamonkey, you can look at the bottom left of your browser to see which site it's trying to connect to when it lags.

item.title: Re: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: I'm not having any trouble at all for the most part, I would check for spyware just to be sure.

item.title: Long Page Loading Times
item.content:encoded: I noticed over the past few days that BvS (and Anime Cubed) pages take forever to load for me. I thought it was my computer or my internet connection at first, but I haven't suffered any slowdown at any other websites, or when playing games on my PC. The lag when loading pages while playing BvS is getting ridiculous (5-20 seconds). It's bad enought that I'm seriously considering not playing anymore. Is anyone having this problem? Is it BvS that's the problem, or do I need to check my PC for spyware or something?
